app_title: Pole Position | The F1 blog for the most passionated fans
welcome_message: Pole Position is the place where you find all latest F1 News. Are you a true passionate F1 fan?
days_since_release: it's been {{number_of_days}} days since this video was released
header_intro: Pole Position is the place where you find all latest F1 News. Are you a true passionate F1 fan? [Student thesis by Karel Decoene]
latest_news_article: Possible advantage for Red Bull in the second half of the season
latest_news_cta: You want to know all F1 latest news?
benefits_title: Discuss the next F1 GP live with others
benefits_introduction: Are you in search of a true F1 community where you can find all latest info related to F1?
benefits_item1_p: Join a community of true F1 enthusiasts. Only they will share your level of passion.
benefits_item2_p: Don't rely on rumors but on true real time info instead. Never miss anything F1 again.
benefits_item3_p: Nothing goes above explaining why a time-penalty was correct to a stranger on the internet.
benefits_item4_p: You want to share your exitement during the GP? We see you. You're not the only one, join others now.
platform_introduction: This is your number one access to F1 articles, driver & team socials, view their history and more.
